\bentry
\word[down(3)]{down}
\pron{Dwnf}
\gl{\kirxvi}
\bmng
(\eng{down most} tamaBAvada \rUpa). 
\bnum
\num{1} (calaneya \vi) meVliMda keLakekx; keLage; nelakekx; adhaHparxdeVshakekx: \eng{fall down} keLakekx biVLu. \eng{knock down} keLakekx keDavu, biVLisu. 
\num{2} (parxdhAnaveMdAgiruva sAthxnadiMda) keLageMdu yA kiVLeMdu BAvisalAda sAthxnakekx: \eng{Lord's amendments sent down to Commons} lADfR\char144 saBeya tidudxpaDigaLanunx kAmanf\char144 saBege kaLuhisalAyitu. 
\num{3} parxvAhada dikikxnalilx; niVru hariyuva dikikxnalilx; parxvAhadoMdige: \eng{row down the river} nadiya parxvAhada dikikxnalilx doVNi naDesu. 
\num{4} gALiyoMdige; gALi biVsuva dikikxnalilx; gALi jotege: \eng{bear down} gALiya dikikxnalilx haDagu naDesu. 
\num{5} (utatxra dikikxniMda) dakiSxNakekx; dakiSxNa dikikxge: \eng{down to Karnataka from Kashmir} (utatxrada) kAshimxVradiMda (dakiSxNada) kanARTakakekx. 
\num{6} (\birx) rAjadhAniyiMda: \eng{down to Mysore from Delhi} rAjadhAni dehaliyiMda meYsUrige. \eng{down to Hassan from Bangalore} rAjadhAni beMgaLUriniMda hAsanakekx. 
\num{7} vishavxvidAyxnilayadiMda: \eng{go down} rajakekx Urige hoVgu; vishavxvidAyxnilayada vAyxsaMga mugida meVle (Urige) hoVgu. \eng{send down} (vishavxvidAyxnilayada shikiSxyAgi) horage hAku; horagaTuTx, kaLuhisibiDu. 
\num{8} (haDagina cukAkxNiya \vi) (gALi biVsuva dikikxge) cukAkxNi cakarxvaninxDu; cakarx tirugisu. 
\num{9} (sathxLada \vi) keLage; keLagina jAgakekx; keLagina jAgadalilx: \eng{blinds were down} kiTakiteregaLanunx iLisalAgitutx. \eng{he is not down yet} avanu (malaguva koVNe \mo vugaLiMda) inUnx keLakekx baMdilalx, iLidu baMdilalx. 
\num{10} (\birx) rAjadhAniyalilxlalxde; rAjadhAniyiMda dUradalilx: \eng{down in the country} gArxmAMtara parxdeVshadalilx. 
\num{11} vishavxvidAyxnilayakekx hoVgade. 
\num{12} bidadx sithxtiyalilx: \eng{don't hit a man who is down } nelakekx bididxruva manuSayxnanunx hoDeya beVDa. 
\num{13} keLamaTaTxdalilx; keLamaTaTxkekx; iLidu: \eng{the river is down} nadi iLidide; parxvAha tagigxde. \eng{temperature is down} tApa iLidide; seke kaDameyAgide. 
\num{14} KinanxvAgi; viSaNaNxteyalilx; edeguMdi; manasusx kugigx; utAsxhavilalxde. 
\num{15} nuMgi; gaMTalalilxLidu: \eng{could not get the pill down} mAterxyanunx nuMgalAgalilalx. 
\num{16} niyaMtarxNadalilx; adhiVnadalilx. 
\num{17} kugigx; iLidu; kaDameyAgi: \eng{the prices are down} belegaLu iLidive. \eng{rice is down} akikxya bele kaDameyAgide; akikx agagxvAgide. 
\num{18} (\ame\ matutx kenaDagaLa phuTfbAlf ceMDina \vi) ATada lekakxkikxradaMte; ATakekx parigaNitavAgadaMte; ATakekx seVradaMte. 
\num{19} avamAnadalilx; taletagigxsuvaMtha sithxtiyalilx. 
\num{20} sherxVNiyalilx keLagina mitiyanunx oLagoMDu: \eng{from king down to cobbler} rAjaniMda moVciyavarege; arasaniMda ALinavarege. 
\num{21} (kAladalilx) hiMdiniMda aMdinavarege: \eng{history of India down to} 1948;- 1948ra varegina BAratada cariterx. \eng{custom handed down} hiMdiniMdalU baMda padadhxti, vADike. 
\num{22} nayavAda sithxtige; nuNaNxge; sUkaSxmX kaNagaLAgi: \eng{grind down} nuNaNxge are; hiTATxguvaMte biVsu. 
\num{23} kqshavAgi; gAtarxdalilx kugigx; saNaNxdAgi: \eng{boil down} kudisi tagigxsu; iMgisu. \eng{wear down} saveduhoVgu; teVduhoVgu. \eng{thin down} kqshavAgu; teLuvAgu. 
\num{24} teLaLxgAgi; niVrAgi: \eng{water down} niVrAgisu; teLaLxgAgisu. 
\num{25} tagigxda savarakekx; kaDame shurxtige. 
\num{26} sharxdedhxyiMda; paTATxgi; manaHpUvaRkavAgi: \eng{to get down to work} kelasakekx sharxdedhxyiMda kuLituko. 
\num{27} aMgatatxnAgi; nelada meVle aDaDxDaDxlAgi: \eng{they tied down the struggling animal} odAdxDutitxdadx pArxNiyanunx aMgatatxnAgi kaTiTxhAkidaru. 
\num{28} mUlakekx; nijasAthxnakekx: \eng{the dogs tracked down the bear} nAyigaLu karaDiya jADanunx adu idadxlilxgeV hiDidavu. 
\num{29} malagi; hAsige hiDidu: \eng{he is down with a cold} negaDiyiMda avanu hAsige hiDididAdxne. 
\num{30} keLa (maTaTxda) sAthxnadalilx; kiVLu aMtasitxnalilx: \eng{some people are kept down by lack of education} vidAyxBAyxsavilalxde kelajana keLamaTaTxdalelxV uLiyutAtxre.
